description: MINUTES IN CHAMBERS - ORDER RE DEFENDANT CARSTEN BREITFELD'S MOTION TO DISMISS 22 by Judge Dolly M. Gee. For the foregoing reasons, the Court GRANTS in part and DENIES in part Breitfeld's MTD. The Court also determines that Plaintiffs will not be able to cure the defects identified above regarding their seventh and eighth causes of action even if given the chance to amend their Complaint. The Court therefore DENIES leave to amend. Breitfeld shall file his Answer to the Complaint no later than May 19, 2020. See minute order for details. (lom) (Entered: 04/28/2020)

description: ORDER DENYING PLAINTIFF'S MOTION FOR PRELIMINARY INJUNCTION AND GRANTING DEFENDANTS' MOTION TO STRIKE 14, 26 by Judge Sherilyn Peace Garnett. The Court DENIES Plaintiff's request for a preliminary injunction and GRANTS Defendants' motion to strike the portions of the FAC based on protected activity. Plaintiff is granted leave to amend and file a new complaint omitting the stricken material no later than fourteen (14) days from the date of this Order (September 23, 2022). Finally, because the Court grants the motion to strike, Defendants may file a motion for attorney's fees and costs no later than September 30, 2022. (iv) (Entered: 09/09/2022)
